website_summaries.verdict: Perfect for the minimalist, this messenger bag can be carried 2 ways, and can hold your essentials, plus a 12-oz. water bottle.
pros: Dual pocket PVC design with canvas-style flap and top zipper
Strap adjusts from 32-inch shoulder strap to 9-inch double handle
Larger pocket big enough for cell phone, wallet, keys, and small water bottle
Second pocket gives you easy access to game tickets, ID, or credit card

customer_reviews.title: Great for concerts/stadiums!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bag for a BTS concert at Rose Bowl stadium last year. I had only planned on using if for the concert only, & it lasted wonderfully for the concert. I ended up using it for the next 6-7 months after the concert, with heavy & rough use, before one of the straps popped off with plastic and all. Is it a great long term purse? No. But the price is amazing, & if you need it just for events, it's perfect for that. Can easily wear it for weeks at a time if need be, & it fits a lot more in there than you'd expect. Definitely recommend it for events!
customer_reviews.author: Sheena Lynch

customer_reviews.title: ... the new SEC stadium policy rules and will be perfect for the next game
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bag because it met the new SEC stadium policy rules and will be perfect for the next game. I am very happy with the bag although I have not actually used it yet. I also think it will be perfect to drop in a beach bag for my phone and kindle rather than the baggie I have used in the past. It arrived quickly and was exactly as described. I also like that I received instructions on how to remove any wrinkles that might have been caused in shipping but this was not necessary for me as it arrived in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: cb

customer_reviews.title: Great Clear Messenger Bag
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this Clear Messenger bag for when we go to the Theme Parks. We live in Orlando and we are Annual Pass Holders. Having a Clear Bag helps me get through security easier most of the time (sometimes the security guards a minute to realize they don't have to do too much).
customer_reviews.author: Emilia Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Cute purse as well as NFL functional
customer_reviews.text: Just the right size and easy to carry on a shoulder. And, I like the fact that I could order 3 different colors for the 3 women going to a Saints game. I ordered bigger clear ones first, would have been great if we needed a diaper bag but we didn't so I returned those and bought these. Also handy for extra items on a car trip, you can see and find them quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Opallu

customer_reviews.title: This was the perfect bag to take to the Detroit Lions game
customer_reviews.text: This was the perfect bag to take to the Detroit Lions game! I had absolutely no problems getting through security. I love that it zips up and it has an extra pocket in the front as well. Couldn't ask for a more perfect bag :D
customer_reviews.author: Lacey

customer_reviews.title: Straps ripped away from plastic
customer_reviews.text: I received this on January 11, 2018. It is now April 28, 2018. I had this bag for approximately 3 1/2 months and I just noticed today that the straps are just about ripped off the sides. I used this bag 3 times a week, not in a rough manner. I feel like it should have lasted a lot longer. Wish I could get a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Maverick

customer_reviews.title: Cute color, handy, good gauge (not super thin) plastic/clear vinyl
customer_reviews.text: Item as described, good price, love the color. The seller also emailed instructions on how to clear out any wrinkles in plastic bags such as this which I never thought of that were super helpful and good to know for any other future plastic/vinyl bags.
customer_reviews.author: Ankhara

customer_reviews.title: Excellent purse for clear bag policy at sporting events
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect size for a clear bag for arenas and stadiums that have a clear bag policy. It comes in many different colors. You can personalize it for your team, by buying a sticker of your team logo, and applying to the front of bag. Team logos are probably available on Amazon. Get creative!
customer_reviews.author: The D.

customer_reviews.text: I wish the plastic was a little thicker. My first one broke so I just ordered another. Hopefully it lasts a little longer than the first one. Also, this would be even cooler if the plastic was colors too. just an idea! UPDATE: got a second bag and the pink flap is a grayish pink and doesn't match the pink piping or strap and the flap is dirty and sewed crookedly.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Glover

customer_reviews.title: Great answer for the new stadium regulations.
customer_reviews.text: This bag will definitely meet my needs and the new regulations for the college football games this year. I do wish there was a little more attention given to the style. It would be nice if the strap and flap covering the front pocket had some design or maybe we're made of a faux leather. The seller was very kind in sending an email with instructions on how to remove any creases that occurred during shipping.
customer_reviews.author: J Waters

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for security!
customer_reviews.text: When I walked through security at a recent outdoor concert, the security guard commented on how easy it was that he could see everything and did not have to open my purse! He liked it too. Holds keys, iPhone 7plus in a case, and two glass-wear cases, at minimum.
customer_reviews.author: Patty

customer_reviews.title: This particular purse worked great for me
customer_reviews.text: I gave it 5 stars because I didn't ding it for being a clear plastic purse which is a fashion tragedy. This particular purse worked great for me. the smaller front pocket was a perfect place to hold the chapstick, sunblock, tickets, etc that I might need to access more often then I could put the lesser-used items in the bigger section. the strap was comfortable the whole time I wore it. Easy wipe down.
customer_reviews.author: deniseo

customer_reviews.title: No thanks.
customer_reviews.text: Was going to give it as a gift to someone and it showed up looking terrible. The Velcro is not level at all, one piece is significantly higher than the other. The flap for the pocket is also crooked, which makes the whole bag look wonky and ugly. Do not recommend and would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Val

customer_reviews.title: Good bag for events.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great clear bag. Definitely worth the price & I'm sure that we'll use it multiple times for events that require these types of bags. This one was for my daughter so the pink was fun. When I ordered the color pink looked like a hot pink. When it arrived, it's a pale pink. Still cute, just wasn't exactly as pictured.
customer_reviews.author: Coco

customer_reviews.title: Perfection in a clear bag
customer_reviews.text: I wore it yesterday for a Copa America game at an NFL stadium. It was perfect!. I easily fit phone, wallet, tissues, lipstick,and glasses. I used it as a crossbody and looked great. Went thru security as expected seamlessly, since meets all the requirements.I was stopped at the stadium by some people who told me it looked great and was asked where I got it. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Patty Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Not so plain clear bag
customer_reviews.text: This is a great bag. It's clear so it meets the requirements of stadiums/concert venues, but it's red strap and star covered front flap give it a unique and great looking design. The adjustable strap is great for length options. The front Velcro flap makes for easy yet secure access, while the zipper closure on the main compartment ensures the rest of your belongs are secure. I would definitely buy this again and would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: chicaT

customer_reviews.title: Great stadium/arena purse
customer_reviews.text: Some stadiums/arenas allow small wristlet purses. Others only allow clear bags. This purse is just perfect for those times when sporting venues only allow clear. The outside pocket can fit an 6S I-phone. The larger pocket can fit a regular size store bought bottled water (leaned at an angle), keys, lipstick, sunglasses and small wallet. Maybe a few smaller items also.
customer_reviews.author: Tatiana

customer_reviews.title: Great for Work
customer_reviews.text: I use this for work and it's fantastic! My only gripe is it's a little too small, but I can fix that by taking stuff out, lol. It fits my phone, iPod, badge, wallet, charger, a small notebook, gum, phone cords and little stuff like chapstick. I love the length of the strap and the little pocket in front. I will definitely buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Julia A. Haynes

customer_reviews.title: Great for Game Day with some modifications
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to attend college football games with the new clear bag policy. The shoulder strap was short on a 5'7'' 122# female. No worries however, as I went to Joanne's Fabric and bought some strap material and took it to our local shoe hospital and they sewed on a much needed longer strap. I had my initials monogramed in the school colors on the place material on the front of the purse and have since received many compliments on it. I like that it has the outside pocket which is perfect for my phone and ticket.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Makes a difference when entering games.
customer_reviews.text: I go to AHL hockey. I get through security in a breeze. No more having to unzip my bag and have them check contents. They hold it up, look and I'm on my way to the game. I think, I'm going to buy the next size up so I can put my blanket inside.
customer_reviews.author: Monkeyshines

customer_reviews.title: Great Bag for Concerts
customer_reviews.text: This bag was a lifesaver when we went to the Pro Football Hall of Fame Stadium. I could get everything I wanted to take and not worry about getting searched. My camera even fit in it!! I love the shoulder strap, so I had my hands free and didn't get a kink in my forearm from a short strap. Well made. I have a feeling I'm going to be using this bag a lot this year.
customer_reviews.author: Joy R Rud

customer_reviews.title: smaller than I thought it would be
customer_reviews.text: I have only used this once. It is stiff but I believe it will soften up with more use. It is a tad smaller than I thought it would be. But I got everything I needed into it. It was just hard to get them out again.
customer_reviews.author: Oma

customer_reviews.title: Great item! Perfect Size!
customer_reviews.text: The item came earlier than expected. The size was perfect and the item was light weight. I’m so glad it came with a pocked on the outside and comes with an adjustable strap. It’s perfect for watching concerts!
customer_reviews.author: Christina Umemura

customer_reviews.title: Short-lived joy
customer_reviews.text: Loved the size. It kept my valuables close and handy. Survived the 4 day trip but gave out on the plane ride home. The plastic tore on both sides where the straps were stitched to the bag. I had to take a needle and thread and patch it up using the neck tags from my t-shirt. Needs reinforcement in that area.
customer_reviews.author: suzmom

customer_reviews.title: Love this bag
customer_reviews.text: I like the size of the bag and use of the front pocket. The front pocket doesnt make the bag too big; its perfect. I can fit everything I need. I get a lot of use out of it since most sporting events and concerts require them instead of purses.
customer_reviews.author: sg17

customer_reviews.title: This bag is perfect for attending an NFL football game
customer_reviews.text: This bag is perfect for attending an NFL football game. I was afraid that it was going to be too small but it is big enough for essentials needed on game day. The strap adjusts so that you can wear it across your shoulder. It felt good to walk past all of the others a bag check.
customer_reviews.author: L. Collins

customer_reviews.title: BIG WASTE OF MONEY!!!
customer_reviews.text: I wish that I had returned this bag! The plastic is so stiff, it can hardly be opened. The front pocket flap has stains (maybe from glue). I wish that I had gone with my gut feeling, that $16.99 was way over priced!! I hope this review will help someone else!!!
customer_reviews.author: Janet L

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Stunning
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this recently to take to a concert. I was expecting much but that was ok because it was for just one night. I was very pleasantly surprised. The bag is very well made with thick plastic and sturdy adjustable straps. I would recommend this purse to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Jackiejean49

customer_reviews.title: Just as Described
customer_reviews.text: This bag is slimline. It fits against my body & holds wallet, phone, charger, keys. The outer flap pocket is handy (I use it for my phone) It is just as described
customer_reviews.author: Layla

customer_reviews.title: Great stadium bag
customer_reviews.text: Great stadium bag. I actually wore this to a golf tournament, and I had no problems getting through security. I pretty much only wear crossbody bags due to their convenience (I hate when bag straps slide off one shoulder), & the strap on this bag adjusts long enough for me to wear it crossbody.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lovely.
customer_reviews.text: When I opened the package to inspect it, everything seemed pretty good and well. I’m using this bag for the BTS concert at MetLife Stadium & this bag fit the requirements, so I am truly happy with my purchase. It also works as a clear makeup back for when i bring my things to work for a touch up and other things !
customer_reviews.author: Brianna Treadwell

customer_reviews.title: Just what I ordered.....
customer_reviews.text: This bag will be helpful at sporting events and concerts that require see-through bags for security. I like the separate compartment for phone. I wanted a shoulder cross/body strap and it seems well made. The vendor sent good directions for warming the plastic with a hair dryer to get the packing wrinkles out.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra C. Martin

customer_reviews.title: Cute, durable, concert approved!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this bag for a concert at the Rosebowl Stadium! Passed through security with no issues! Fit a good amount of belongings inside (can fit 2 factory-sealed 16 oz water bottles). Even after using at 2 concerts one week after another within the same month, the bag has held up really well despite all the jumping and dancing! Purchased the white color and even considering buying this bag in black and the other colors available. Looks really cute with any outfit! :)
customer_reviews.author: Linelle Libang

customer_reviews.title: It didn't fall apart on first use like another clear bag I bought at the same time
customer_reviews.text: It didn't fall apart on first use like another clear bag I bought at the same time, but it's stiff and the zipper is hard to use. But these are so cheap it's hard to complain.
customer_reviews.author: SueF

customer_reviews.title: I received an email from the sender shortly after delivery ensuring that I was completely satisfied and providing some pointers
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for an NHL game. I just read the security rules for the stadium and even though they don't yet require clear bags, this bag is cute enough that I'll use it anyway. I received an email from the sender shortly after delivery ensuring that I was completely satisfied and providing some pointers on how to get any wrinkles (caused by shipping) out. I'm very satisfied with this purchase and it was barely wrinkled upon delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Team Karbo

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for stadiums with clear bag policy.
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I needed for football season! I needed a place to hold my dental hygiene kit (wearing Invisalign in public is no joke). This little purse is the perfect size for my kit, wallet, power bank, cell phone, and keys. It feels sturdy and made of good quality materials.
customer_reviews.author: iJustWantCake

customer_reviews.title: This is exactly what my wife needed and she is totally happy with the product
customer_reviews.text: We had been notified by our alma mater, that new security precautions would be in effect for the upcoming football season. This is exactly what my wife needed and she is totally happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmer

customer_reviews.title: Strap broke the first time I used it
customer_reviews.text: Plastic is super stiff the first time. It might loosen up with use but I don't know if I'll ever know because the cheap strap broke the very first time I used it. It literally unraveled and was being held together with one very frayed string. I'm going to attempt to sew it together but I'm not sure how successful I'll be with such cheap materials. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: I wish I could rate this as a zero star

customer_reviews.title: Gameday essential
customer_reviews.text: For the price this product is amazing. Has held up over multiple events and got the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Abby Pugh

customer_reviews.title: Check stadiums
customer_reviews.text: Check the stadium rules before purchasing, could not use at The University of Michigan
customer_reviews.author: Denise Hodges

customer_reviews.title: Great for concerts and events
customer_reviews.text: I use this product for any sporting event or concert. Makes getting through security lines quick and easy.
customer_reviews.author: Meg B.

customer_reviews.title: Looks great.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bag after attending a UCLA/Rose Bowl game last year and I was told that I would have to transfer all of my purse belongings into a clear zip lock bag. I'll be attending another game soon so (as the description stated) I'm hoping it will pass inspection. Thank you! Looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Lori K.

customer_reviews.title: Nice bag for ballgames
customer_reviews.text: The bag is pretty and well made. It is a tiny bit smaller than the bag I had, but I managed to get everything in it.
customer_reviews.author: Loretta P.

customer_reviews.title: Clear Bag policy for Stadiums, Concerts and Games
customer_reviews.text: Good price, used at a concert as they have implemented the Clear Bag policy. Worked perfectly well and was able to keep showing my patriotic pride!
customer_reviews.author: Book Worm

customer_reviews.title: Good bag
customer_reviews.text: Cute little stadium bag- I take it everywhere I know there are crowds and security
customer_reviews.author: Loudblonde

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again!
customer_reviews.text: Wore this to a concert and it was the perfect size for what I brought. Unfortunately, it got tugged on, and overloaded with other people's things and tore a tiny bit. Still functional, and would definitely purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley F.

customer_reviews.title: Appears it will work for NFL game
customer_reviews.text: Should work good for NFL game I will be attending next month. Seller contacted after I received the product with directions on how to remove any wrinkles/creases from shipping, which I thought was a nice touch.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Alexis

customer_reviews.title: Great Bag!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice little bag, actually holds quite a bit for the size. The outside pocket is very helpful, quick access for your ticket etc. I wore it as a cross body bag, just felt more secure that way.
customer_reviews.author: Patti Ca

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than you think!
customer_reviews.text: Pretty sturdy. I like the side compartment. And the shoulder strap adjusts. But it is way way way smaller than even the picture looks. It might fir your wallet and a few loose items. You can't carry a lot in this bag
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: A useful bag
customer_reviews.text: This bag certainly served its purpose. I went to a weekend event, and there were no handbags allowed, only clear bags. So this worked well. I do wish the strap had a few more inches on it. I'm 5'9", and with the strap fully extended, the bag didn't quite hit my waist, so although functional, it wasn't as comfortable as I would have liked
customer_reviews.author: barbhark

customer_reviews.title: Very practical.
customer_reviews.text: I love clear bags and started looking for one with a camouflage trim. This is perfect and is also the perfect size to carry everything I need. The main pocket for my wallet and cell phone with the smaller pocket for cosmetics and earphones.
customer_reviews.author: Lorna

customer_reviews.title: Made well
customer_reviews.text: Nicely made; I was not satisfied with the nylon white strap, was hoping for something a little more dressy ( as dressy as a vinyl bag can be anyway!) I have it to my grand daughter and she LOVES it!
customer_reviews.author: Joan M. Strayham

customer_reviews.title: Stadium Approved!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this crossbody for an NFL game as I was traveling two hours from home for the day and didn’t want just a clutch. It worked perfect and after I was in the stadium I was able to wear it comfortably under my coat. It was a little stiff when it arrived, but worked well with a zipper closure and velcro for the front flap.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: Cute Ideal size!
customer_reviews.text: I drive for Lyft and wanted something to put treats and gum in. This is perfect. It hangs around the passenger headrest and can be reached by all. Snacks in large compartment gum in the small! I get many compliments on it.
customer_reviews.author: Hollyseattle

customer_reviews.title: Total cheap junk
customer_reviews.text: This is complete junk.. The plastic is such poor quality it's not even really clear, at best it's opaque.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Clear Stadium Messenger Bag
customer_reviews.text: When you go to basketball, baseball, football games you need to have one to take some of you essentials with you
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good s
customer_reviews.text: This little bag will work great for concerts & other venues that require clear bags. Easier than carrying a plastic storage bag.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Chance

customer_reviews.title: This bag is awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: This bag is awesome!!! Although it is to be used at Chicago Bears games where purses are not allowed due to security reasons, I used it on a rainy day while watching an obstacle course race. Between the purse and clear rain jacket and pants, I and my possessions were nice and dry. Am very happy with the product. Thank you! Angie
customer_reviews.author: Anna Marie

customer_reviews.title: Love my new bag!
customer_reviews.text: I had to purchase a clear bag to attend a Super Bowl 50 event. I only wanted a crossbody, & found this fantastic bag. It was spacious & comfortable to wear. I was able to get everything I needed into the bag. The price point was perfect! The rep from the company who sold it to me through Amazon sent a follow up email that was beneficial to understand how to best use & take care of my bag. It traveled very well in my suitcase. I give it 5 stars! Now I have it for other football, baseball, & hockey events.
customer_reviews.author: Mazah

customer_reviews.title: straps tore in less than a week- don't bother
customer_reviews.text: I do actually really like the bag but I didn't give it five stars because it's much smaller than a messenger bag typically is. But I'm keeping it.******update******* had the bag for less than a week and the straps ripped. Not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Hamminit

customer_reviews.title: Clear Bag
customer_reviews.text: The clear bag is perfect for my wife's use. It is high quality and anyone who purchases it should be satisfied. The seller even sent an email describing what to do to get the wrinkles out and how to care for it. they are customer friendly.
customer_reviews.author: James F Mayfield

customer_reviews.title: Ok, not great. Small
customer_reviews.text: It’s ok. Suffices if you don’t have much to carry.
customer_reviews.author: Kitz’l

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a one day trip
customer_reviews.text: I wore this across my body as a purse for the Women's March on Washington. It fit my phone, travel toothbrush/paste, chapstick, maps, glasses case, and snacks and there was room to spare. It was worn comfortably over a large winter coat. Cute too!
customer_reviews.author: BCJ

customer_reviews.title: The bag I ordered was perfect and well-made in every way
customer_reviews.text: The bag I ordered was perfect and well-made in every way. I did end up returning it because I had chosen an incorrect style for my needs. The company was helpful and truly concerned with my satisfaction of the bag. I will be ordering from this company again. Quality product!!
customer_reviews.author: Ruthe Barron

customer_reviews.title: not bad for raves
customer_reviews.text: Glad it came with the email to get it to chamge it's shape. Took it to a paint rave sinve you have to have clear bags and the strap ate into my skin so I had my friend hold onto it. Took some skill to get all of the paint out and off of the bag which I will use again.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly S

customer_reviews.title: Nice Bag
customer_reviews.text: I use it primarily when I visit a stadium that has adopted the clear bag policy. Served its purpose well. I like that its a cross-body...still feel like I'm carrying a purse.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Johnson-Lackey

customer_reviews.title: She loved it and did not want to give it back
customer_reviews.text: I never got to use the purse yet but borrowed it to my sister-in-law when we went to a Packer game. She loved it and did not want to give it back.
customer_reviews.author: Janice

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this purse size see-through bag. Perfect for football games, going through security.
customer_reviews.author: toni

customer_reviews.title: Great for Stadiums
customer_reviews.text: Nice to have for stadiums that don't allow opaque bags. Large enough for personal items, but not food or blanket. Somewhat stiff but can live with it.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Very small in person
customer_reviews.text: Much smaller than expected. Will fit just a wallet, phone and lipstick. Also, strap is pretty short, wish it was longer.
customer_reviews.author: Natasha Rendon

customer_reviews.title: Great but a bit small
customer_reviews.text: This worked great but was just a little smaller than I expected. It won't zip closed with a large hairbrush in it, but other than that, works great.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Thrower

customer_reviews.title: Product was good for a smaller clear bag for stadium use
customer_reviews.text: Product was good for a smaller clear bag for stadium use. I've used it and moved through security easily. I did find it small as others commented, it is the dimensions described which is fairly roomy. The only thing I did not like was that the strap was not long enough for cross body use (a bit short on me when fully extended and I'm 5'4)
customer_reviews.author: Margaret W

customer_reviews.title: Cheap yet durable materials
customer_reviews.text: It's very cheaply made so for the price it's good! It's lasted me a long time and it's still good! It's just cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Payton Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: SPORTS STADIUM COMPLIANT
customer_reviews.text: Just the right size. The seller contacted me after delivery to offer suggestions for removing wrinkles that was very useful, especially for the plastic product
customer_reviews.author: Margaret A

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this one. Buy better made
customer_reviews.text: It would have been perfect had it not opened at the stitching!!! Bag fell apart after a few months use.
customer_reviews.author: L. Neuman

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t expand
customer_reviews.text: It’s what you expect it to be! Used it for the BTS concert at Rosebowl. Put a ton of enamel pins on it it looked cute. My only complaint is the plastic is a little rough so it doesn’t open/expand very well. Still a good amount of room.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I use it for all my sunscreens for my kids and it’s perfect for that!
customer_reviews.author: Annie J.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: Love!!! Love!!! Love!!! This clear Messenger bag its has been a great Investment its easy to use, if you work at a Retail Store this item is perfect to have for work purpose, perfect when your traveling & perfect to use at a concert, I highly recommend this Item!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT FOR GOING TO STADIUM VENUE
customer_reviews.text: This bag is perfect for the sporting and concerts I go to. Had a cheap made one that I purchased at the stadium that cost me twice as much and lasted until I got home. This bag is well made with thick plastic and from what I can see, good sewing of straps. I believe this will last me a few seasons. Will use this seller again in a heartbeat for I received when promised & is exactly as the description stated.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie J.

customer_reviews.title: Great Bag
customer_reviews.text: This bag was exactly what I needed, great size and comfortable to wear. The front pocket is very convenient for items you may need quick access to.
customer_reviews.author: FH158

customer_reviews.title: Stiff plastic
customer_reviews.text: Plastic is very stiff and firm, but will have to do.
customer_reviews.author: Ginny C.

customer_reviews.title: priced well
customer_reviews.text: It was acceptable at the NFL stadium. I bought this because of the over the shoulder strap, however, I found it very uncomfortable around my neck. The strap is rough. However, it served its purpose for a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Clear for security to see in it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag it was perfect for Crew52 check in. Thank you so much I love it!
customer_reviews.author: VINETTE MENSHEK

customer_reviews.title: Not for Me
customer_reviews.text: I did not like this bag, it was smaller then i thought. I also spilled something in here and i cleaned it so many times with soap and hot water, but the smell would not come out. If you need this bag just for your phone, keys, and wallet, that's about how much you can fit in here.
customer_reviews.author: Brittny

customer_reviews.title: clear bag
customer_reviews.text: perfect for any stadium game t wear across your shoulder .
customer_reviews.author: Awesome Angie amazon buyer

customer_reviews.title: It’s OK
customer_reviews.text: Seemed more like a bag for a girl than a lady.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fast shipping
customer_reviews.text: fast shipping and nice bag just not as roomy as I thought it would be kinda flat. Seller did good description of it though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great to use at stadium
customer_reviews.text: Great to use at stadium. Have used for several events.Plenty of room, I like the separate section. No dislikes at this time
customer_reviews.author: Cathy

customer_reviews.title: I use this bag to carry condiments including my peppermill ...
customer_reviews.text: I use this bag to carry condiments including my peppermill, hot sauce, a knife for slicing and cereal to the dining area of my assisted living facility. I can see the items as needed and they are kept neat and clean. It is very convenient.
customer_reviews.author: DeeHam

customer_reviews.title: Perfect bag size for all needed essentials Phone
customer_reviews.text: Perfect bag size for all needed essentials Phone, tissue, wallet, small germ x, napkins, Small binoculars, powder compact, lipstick, Mints, still had room little extra. Waterproof It rained going to entrance of stadium.
customer_reviews.author: Ruby Berthelette

customer_reviews.title: Great size & really cute!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a music festival and it was the perfect size! I got lots of compliments from complete strangers. I wish the front pocket was a zipper not velcro but it's not a deal breaker at all. Love the camo!
customer_reviews.author: Alex F

customer_reviews.title: Nice size and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Nice size and easy to use. Much better than the larger one that was given to me. Have only used it 2 times so I don't know about durability.
customer_reviews.author: pegO

customer_reviews.title: It is an OK bag. I received it today ...
customer_reviews.text: It is an OK bag. I received it today and gave it to my wife as a present. She noticed that the hand strap is starting to break and she hasn't used it yet.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Vazquez

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great size for concert fits all I need wallet and phone. It’s really handy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for sports venues
customer_reviews.text: They just sent me through at the Twins game when they saw the clear bag - no problem at all. The bag is a perfect small size and has a nice adjustable strap.
customer_reviews.author: CTinHerm

customer_reviews.title: I bought this bag just a few months ago and ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bag just a few months ago and yesterday the strap just randomly ripped away from the plastic leaving it unfixable with a gaping hole.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for what its needed for. Just wish for a longer strap.
customer_reviews.text: Good size. Fits what you need in it to be able to get into a stadium game. However, my only disappointment is that I wish the strap was a little longer, to wear it as a crossbody. The strap is a little short
customer_reviews.author: ashley

customer_reviews.title: but appears to be of good quality.
customer_reviews.text: A little smaller than I expected, but appears to be of good quality.
customer_reviews.author: grainne fox

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfect for football game and love the camp style
customer_reviews.author: Nscamuffa312

customer_reviews.title: This is perfect for me to take to football games
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for me to take to football games. I wish I had read a little more on the size and purchased larger. If I buy jerseys. T Shirts. Etc... at the games, it will be a tight fit. Quality is great.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

product_meta.title: Clear Purse Stadium Approved for NFL & NCAA, Transparent Cross-body Bag see-thru
product_meta.description:
Nova Sport Wear 8 Inch Square Clear Messenger Bag. NFL Approved and wherever clear bag rule apply.

Product Features:


- Dimensions 8” x 8” x 3”


- Long Adjustable Strap (total over shoulder length 32”)


- 2 Roomy Pockets; Large zippered pocket with room for a water bottle, sun block, and small tablet; Small front pocket is ideal for ID, credit cards, and cell phone


- Water Resistant, keeping your items dry when a light shower rolls in 

- Stylish clear messenger bag design in a rainbow of colors




This is our most popular style clear purse. It is a clear cross-body bag with a long adjustable strap that makes it a multifunctional accessory. At its longest adjustment the clear bag strap easily sits over the shoulder while the clear bag itself rests comfortably on your hip. At the shortest adjustment the strap becomes a double handle allowing you to carry it as a clear handbag. 



Additional Uses
- Clear Travel Bag


- Clear Toiletry Bag


- Clear Lunch Bag


- Clear Security Bag



Nova Sport Wear clear bags are made to be compliant with all NFL, NCAA, PGA, Stadium, and Arena clear bag policies. Our totes are built with quality materials and are guaranteed to never rip or tear. We offer a variety of colors to match your favorite team, outfit, or to just stand out in a sea of black transparent bags.







PRODUCT DETAILS
 * Is Discontinued By Manufacturer :No
 * Product Dimensions :8 x 3 x 8 inches; 7 Ounces
 * Department :Womens
 * Date First Available :October 21, 2015
 * ASIN :B016YK13EG

feature_bullets: FASHIONABLE & FUNCTIONAL - Our dual pocket design with a top zipper and canvas style flap looks great across your body while you carry your belongings. Just because your bag needs to be transparent doesn't mean it shouldn't be seen.
ADJUSTABLE & ROOMY - Adjusts from a 32" shoulder strap to a convenient 9" double handle. Bag measures 8"W x 8"H x 3"D.

WATERPROOF - One of the biggest benefits of a bag made of plastic is that it is completely waterproof. This purse zippers on top from edge to edge so your belongings stay dry if you get caught in a light shower.
STADIUM COMPLIANT - Approved to be used where regulations require clear bags such as NFL football games, casinos, events, parks, and college stadiums.

HIGH QUALITY VERSATILE - You will find more to use this well made clear tote bag for then just game day or work. It is suitable for travel, airport security, the beach, and cosmetics. Clearly your best choice.
